AI Description: ModelTest-NG is a software for the selection of nucleotide substitution models in phylogenetics. It uses model selection strategies to automatically choose the best-fit nucleotide substitution model for a given dataset, which is essential for accurate phylogenetic inference.
Core Features: Automated Selection Of Nucleotide Substitution Models, Compatibility With Popular Phylogenetic Software Packages, Support For Multiple Model Selection Strategies, Statistical Evaluation Of Model Adequacy
General Tags: Phylogenetics, Model Selection, Phylogenetic Inference, Nucleotide Substitution Models
